item.title: HELOC Requirements 2025: Credit Score, Income, and Equity Guidelines by Lender Type
item.description:
HELOC approval isn’t as simple as having home equityâ€”lenders evaluate credit scores, debt-to-income ratios, combined loan-to-value limits, income stability, and payment history through structured underwriting guidelines that vary significantly by lender type. Understanding these requirements before applying helps borrowers strengthen weak areas, choose appropriate lenders, and avoid unnecessary credit inquiries from lenders who won’t approve their profiles.

Minimum Credit Score Requirements by Lender Type

Credit score minimums for HELOC approval vary widely depending on whether you apply through big banks, credit unions, online lenders, or portfolio lenders. Each lender type serves different credit tiers with corresponding rate and term adjustments.
